member.name: T:Orion.Framework.InstancedServiceAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that can be applied to a class to indicate that it is an instanced service, not a static service.

member.name: T:Orion.Framework.IService
member.summary: Represents a service.
member.remarks: Services are modules providing a specific type of functionality to consumers. By default, these services are statically loaded once Orion is loaded, and disposed once Orion is disposed. However, services can be annotated with , in which case they will be injected per-instance and disposed once the parent object is garbage collected.

member.name: P:Orion.Framework.IService.Author
member.summary: Gets the service's author.

member.name: P:Orion.Framework.IService.Name
member.summary: Gets the service's name.

member.name: P:Orion.Framework.IService.Version
member.summary: Gets the service's version.

member.name: T:Orion.Framework.OrionNinjectModule
member.summary: A Ninject module that scans for services and plugins in the executing assembly and plugin assemblies, binding them to the appropriate scopes.

member.name: M:Orion.Framework.OrionNinjectModule.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified plugin directory.

member.name: T:Orion.Framework.OrionService
member.summary: Provides the base class for an .

member.name: P:Orion.Framework.OrionService.Version
member.remarks: By default, this property returns the version of the assembly containing the derived type.

member.name: M:Orion.Framework.OrionService.Finalize
member.summary: Destroys the service, releasing any of its unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Orion.Framework.OrionService.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the service and any of its unmanaged and managed resources.

member.name: M:Orion.Framework.OrionService.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the service and any of its unmanaged resources, optionally including its managed resources.
member.param: true if called from a managed disposal and both unmanaged and managed resources must be released, false if called from a finalizer and only unmanaged resources must be released.
member.remarks: If your service has unmanaged resources, you must release them here.

member.name: T:Orion.Framework.OverrideServiceAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that can be applied to a class to indicate that it overrides a service.
member.remarks: Having multiple implementations of a service with this attribute results in undefined behavior.

member.name: T:Orion.Networking.Packets.TerrariaPacket
member.summary: Represents a Terraria packet.
member.remarks: Terraria packets are limited to a maximum of 65536 bytes, but this restriction is not enforced immediately on each of the packet types. Instead, this restriction is enforced when the packet is sent.
